text:
Peter Elliot Rae (born 24 September 1932) is an Australian politician. He was a member of the Liberal Party. He served as a Senator for Tasmania from 1967 to 1986. He was a member of the Tasmanian House of Assembly from 1986 to 1989.
Rae was born in Launceston, Tasmania. In 1956, he married Rosemary. The couple have three sons.
